amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the types of fees "demo day" sponsors can collect and require an issuer to be a real business.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clay amendment Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 253 (Roll no. 30).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clay amendment Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 253 (Roll no. 30).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Clay.
